official_title: A bill to specify the burden of proof in certain Federal civil suits relating to conditions in State penal facilities.

summary.text: States that the burden of proof in Federal civil suits regarding overcrowding in State penal facilities in violation of the eighth amendment shall be by clear and convincing evidence.
